00223         /*! Return the number of cells on the array.
00224          *      This is the number of the intensity data elements and is == GetRows() * GetCols()
00225          *      Stdev, NumPixels, Outlier and Masked data is optional, but if present they will have GetNumCells elements.
00226          *      @return Number of cells in the array.
00227          */
00228         int32_t GetNumCells();

00247         /*! Get the cell intensity, standard deviation, number of pixels, outlier flag and mask flag.
00248          *      @param cellIdx Index of the cell.
00249          *      @param intensity The intensity of the cell.
00250          *      @param stdev The standard deviation of the cell.
00251          *      @param numPixels The number of pixels in the cell.
00252          *      @param outlier The outlier flag of the cell.
00253          *      @param masked The masked flag of the cell.
00254          */
00255         void GetData(int32_t cellIdx, float& intensity, float& stdev, int16_t& numPixels, bool& outlier, bool& masked);

00265         bool HasNumPixels();

00274          *      @param cellIdxStart Cell index of the first intensity to retrieve.

00277          *      @return True if all intensities were retrieved.
00278          */
00279         bool GetIntensities(int32_t cellIdxStart, int32_t count, FloatVector& values);
00280 
00281         /*! Get the standard deviations for a range of cell indexes.
00282          *      @param cellIdxStart Cell index of the first standard deviation to retrieve.
00283          *      @param count Number of cell standard deviations to retrieve.
00284          *      @param values Retrieved cell standard deviations.
00285          *      @return True if all standard deviations were retrieved.
00286          */
00287         bool GetStdev(int32_t cellIdxStart, int32_t count, FloatVector& values);
00288 
00289         /*! Get the number of pixels for a range of cell indexes.
00290          *      @param cellIdxStart Cell index of the first pixel count to retrieve.
00291          *      @param count Number of cell pixels to retrieve.
00292          *      @param values Retrieved cell pixel counts
00293          *      @return True if all pixel count (number of pixels) were retrieved.
00294          */
00295         bool GetNumPixels(int32_t cellIdxStart, int32_t count, Int16Vector& values);
00296 
00297         /*! Get the outlier flags for a range of cell indexes.
00298          *      @param cellIdxStart Cell index of the first outlier flag to retrieve.
00299          *      @param count Number of cell outlier flags to retrieve.
00300          *      @param values Retrieved cell outlier flags
00301          *      @return True if all outlier flags were retrieved.
00302          */
00303         bool GetOutliers(int32_t cellIdxStart, int32_t count, BoolVector& values);
00304 
00305         /*! Get the mask flags for a range of cell indexes.

00307          *      @param count Number of cell mask flags to retrieve.
00308          *      @param values Retrieved cell mask flags
00309          *      @return True if all mask flags were retrieved.
00310          */
00311         bool GetMasked(int32_t cellIdxStart, int32_t count, BoolVector& values);
00312 
00313         /*! Get the coordinates of all outlier cells (i.e. outlier flag is true).
00314          *      @param coords Cell coordinates.
00315          */
00316         void GetOutlierCoords(XYCoordVector& coords);
00317 
00318         /*! Get the coordinates of all masked cells (i.e. mask flag is true).

00320          */
00321         void GetMaskedCoords(XYCoordVector& coords);

00399         void SetInt32ToGenericHdrParameterList(const std::wstring& name, int32_t value);

00403          */
00404         std::wstring GetWStringFromGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name);

00415         bool IsOutlier(int32_t cellIdx);

00418          *      @return True if the cell mask flag is true
00419          */
00420         bool IsMasked(int32_t cellIdx);

00425         DataSetHeader* FindDataSetHeader(const std::wstring& name);
